mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.`perms` FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN `sys_role` r ON ur.`role_id` = r.`id` LEFT JOIN `sys_role_menu` rm ON ur.`role_id` = rm.`role_id` LEFT JOIN `sys_menu` m ON m.`id` = rm.`menu_id` WHERE user_id = #{userid} AND r.`is_delete` = 0 AND m.`is_delete` = 0 AND m.perms is not null
